Package de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.curation.component.model

Model classes for curation/correction related components

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BratCurationVisualizer
    Wicket panel for visualizing an annotated sentence in brat.
    CurationBuilder
    This class is responsible for two things.
    CurationContainer
    A model for curation container comprises of CurationViewForSourceDocument, SourceDocument, and Project
    CurationUserSegmentForAnnotationDocument
    A Model comprises of document and collection brat responses togehter with the username that will populate the sentence with AnnotationDocuments
    CurationViewForSourceDocument
    A model comprises of Curation Segments comprising of the begin and end of a sentence, SentenceState Sentence number and the text (the Sentence content)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnnotationState
    State of an annotated span (or arc).
    SentenceState
    An ennumeration to differentiate sentences in a document with different colors so as to easily identify
